tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Suresh Lsave is professionally competent & one of the most experienced doctor in dentistry,  who has also had the privilege of serving in the army for over 26 years. Endowed  with pleasing personality & a friendly face, his interaction with the patients to solve their dental problems is extremely good. His staff members are also very cordial & very prompt to provide necessary treatment as per his directions. I give him 9/10 points & wish him luck. May he keep providing his expert medical services to the patients as hithertofore. Meher Verma!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
. Good explaination of the problem and then treatment .
Very professional approach .
All staff are warm

tags: Value for money,
review: I Manish Khatri From USA Visited Gurukrupa Advanceed Dental Care for full mouth rehabilitation with 32 E- Max crowns and Laminates on my 32 teeth,Dr Suresh Isawes work is excellent,he finished the treatment in such short time of 20 days and  l can say now that I have a million dollar smile,which boost my confidence so much , good I took the decision to do the treatment in India and not in US,I saved lot of money and time and such a fantastic result.Thanks a ton Dr Isawe,God bless you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Lt Col. Dr. Suresh Isawe is a truely gentleman dr. 41years of experience. And understands patience financial background and offers best treatment possible. For any complicated issues he is excellent. I will highly recommend him. Wish him all the best for giving his services. 
Thanks

Dr sures Isawe did the cavity filling of my 4 tooth. They all started paining after the filling. I tried contacting him, but he didn’t bother to respond for 2 days even after leaving messages with the receptionist at his clinic. I had to go to another doctor after 10 days of excruciating pain and get the X-ray done to find out the diagnosis. He didn’t do any X-ray before doing the dental filling of my four tooth. I paid Dr Suresh Isawe 10750 Rs for fillings for getting pain with no satisfactory response. Nobody bothered to check on me even after telling them the issue. ****** ** ***** ** **** *** *****
